name: The Balding Werewolf
desc: This individual was hoping for a cureall to fix male-patterned baldness but got more fur than he was hoping for.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The werewolf makes two attacks: One with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.
